abstract.p: The MiMo2 translation system combines several leading ideas in the areas of linguistics, computation and translation. In the area of translation we follow the ideas of Landsbergen (1987) by assuming that translation is symmetric; and combine these ideas with the advantages of a transfer approach. Computationally the system focuses on "computability" and "declarativity." The linguistics of the system is based on a "lexicalistic" and "sign-based" approach to grammar.
